name: cordova.plugin.couchbaselite
description: A reference implementation of a cordova native plugin for couchbase lite on Android. In order to use Couchbase Lite as embedded database within your Cordova-based app, you will need a way to access Couchbase Lite’s native APIs from within your Cordova web application. This plugin allows web-based apps running in a Cordova webview to access native platform functionality through a Javascript interface.
author: Couchbase
